sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import NavBar from './NavBar' import CharacterSelect from './CharacterSelect' class Campaign extends React.Component{ render(){ console.log(this.props.location.state.game) return(

{this.props.location.state.game.name}

Location: {this.props.location.state.game.location}

Dungeon Master: {this.props.location.state.game.dungeon_master.name}

Description: {this.props.location.state.game.desc}

Role Playing Intensity: {this.props.location.state.game.rplevel}

Experience Level: {this.props.location.state.game.explevel}

Party:

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[0].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[0].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[0].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[0].race[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[0].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[0].alignment}

Player: {this.props.location.state.game.players[1].username}

Character Name: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].name}

Character Class: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].class[0].name}

Character Race: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].race[0].name}

Level: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].level}

Alignment: {this.props.location.state.game.party[1].alignment}

) } } const mapStateToProps = (store) => { return { currentUser: store.currentUser, selectedCharacter: store.selectedCharacter } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { LogIn: (loggedInUser) => { dispatch({ type: 'LOGIN_CURRENT_USER', user: loggedInUser }) } } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Campaign);
